EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - API Test Automation 101 (was Web Services) - English - 2015.04.16.Emai
EmailTemplate.subject: We missed you at our Web Services Test Automation 101 webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: API Test Automation 101
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Sorry that we missed you at our webinar “Web Services Test Automation 101”. Tricentis Product Manager, Georg Thurner, talked about how how Tricentis Tosca Testsuite fundamentally changes users’ approach to testing by making sure that testing can start as soon as the first web service interfaces are defined. Questions from the audience made the discussion lively.
Want to see what you missed? Watch the recording here <http://www.tricentis.com/thank-you-page-api-test-automation-101-2015-04-16>.
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Georg Thurner Product Manager Tricentis
